article_title: Top 20 vendors for outsourced revenue cycle, large health systems: Blackbook
article_text:
A new survey by BlackBook Research found the vast majority of healthcare executives plan to outsource components of their revenue cycle processes to outside vendors. But what they don't all agree on is what vendor is best for them.

The following list is the top 20 outsourced revenue cycle vendors for large health systems, hospital chains or major healthcare corporations, according to BlackBook, based on the group's latest survey.

[Also:Healthcare bullish on outsourcing revenue cycle]

Advance to the next slide to begin the gallery.

Twitter: @HC_Finance

og.description: Health systems seem to agree that outsourcing revenue cycle is best, but they don't all agree on is what vendor is best for them.

article_summary:
The following list is the top 20 outsourced revenue cycle vendors for large health systems, hospital chains or major healthcare corporations, according to BlackBook, based on the group's latest survey.
A new survey by BlackBook Research found the vast majority of healthcare executives plan to outsource components of their revenue cycle processes to outside vendors.
[Also:Healthcare bullish on outsourcing revenue cycle]Advance to the next slide to begin the gallery.
But what they don't all agree on is what vendor is best for them.
